about_the_game:
This sample game (DEMO) for you to test whether your computer can be used to play the main game ("TheGreat") or not and have seen the game play, basic game contents for you to make decisions before buying.

In-game content You take on the role of a person with special powers. You live in the city with these criminals (in the first early access of the game, these criminals would be just ordinary people. But there will be more content and characters that are complex and have special powers as well) that you will have to fight with. These criminals will make your life difficult. Plus you have to work. To make a living for yourself. People or NPCs in the game is very effective to your life Often they will ask you for help but this help will bring danger to you as well.

content_descriptors.notes:
In the content of the game, there are talks about criminals, fighting, using violence. there is destruction of the body but as a superhero fighting villains.
There may be images of shirtless in male characters. to create realism in the role of a criminal But there are no shirtless female characters.

detailed_description:
This sample game (DEMO) for you to test whether your computer can be used to play the main game ("TheGreat") or not and have seen the game play, basic game contents for you to make decisions before buying.

In-game content You take on the role of a person with special powers. You live in the city with these criminals (in the first early access of the game, these criminals would be just ordinary people. But there will be more content and characters that are complex and have special powers as well) that you will have to fight with. These criminals will make your life difficult. Plus you have to work. To make a living for yourself. People or NPCs in the game is very effective to your life Often they will ask you for help but this help will bring danger to you as well.
name: The Great Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: How do you feel If you have to live as someone living in a city full of dangerous criminals. But you still have to live, eat, work, sleep and socialize. It sounds normal. but it's not normal because you have a special power. Stronger than other. But... are you sure? that you can survive...
